5_1Ax7URbeVrWRB6zcmg3eYVeyiTz6iYyEd7.body: Now I finished the first season of Bungou Stray Dogs. It is good enough for me, and I like the humor in that anime. Now I need to find a woman who will commit a double suicide with me.
I need to watch more White Fox's animes. Jormungand was planned. Hmm... White Fox uses "Zero" in the titles of few their animes.
